items.name: Registry tweak: MenuShowDelay
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Explorer menu delay to 0ms (snappier menus).

items.name: Registry tweak: MouseHoverTime
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Reduce mouse hover time.

items.name: Registry tweak: ForegroundLockTimeout
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Reduce foreground lock timeout.

items.name: Registry tweak: DisablePreviewDesktop
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable Aero Peek.

items.name: Registry tweak: TaskbarAnimations
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable taskbar animations.

items.name: Registry tweak: ListviewAlphaSelect
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable selection fade effects.

items.name: Registry tweak: ListviewShadow
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable icon shadows.

items.name: Registry tweak: ColorPrevalence
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Enable accent color on title bars.

items.name: Registry tweak: AllowGameDVR
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable GameDVR (policy).

items.name: Registry tweak: ShowStartupPanel
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable Game Bar startup panel.

items.name: Registry tweak: UseNexusForGameBarEnabled
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable Game Bar Nexus.

items.name: Registry tweak: DisableTailoredExperiencesWithDiagnosticData
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable tailored experiences.

items.name: Registry tweak: SilentInstalledAppsEnabled
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable silent app installs.

items.name: Registry tweak: DisableWebSearch
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable web search in Start.

items.name: Registry tweak: AllowSearchToUseLocation
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable search location usage.

items.name: Registry tweak: WaitToKillServiceTimeout
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Reduce service stop timeout.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_TrackDocs
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable tracking of recent documents.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_TrackProgs
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable tracking of frequently used programs.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_IrisRecommendations
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable Start recommendations.

items.name: Registry tweak: ShowSyncProviderNotifications
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable sync provider notifications.

items.name: Registry tweak: ShowFrequent
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable frequent files in Quick Access.

items.name: Registry tweak: ShowRecent
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable recent files in Quick Access.

items.name: Registry tweak: EnableBalloonTips
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable balloon tips.

items.name: Registry tweak: iFirstDayOfWeek
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Set first day of week to Sunday (optional).

items.name: Registry tweak: DisableCMD
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Ensure CMD is not disabled by policy.

items.name: Registry tweak: SeparateProcess
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Run folder windows in separate process.

items.name: Registry tweak: DisableAcrylicBackgroundOnLogon
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable acrylic background on logon.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_ShowMoreTiles
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Reduce tiles/Start clutter.

items.name: Registry tweak: DisableNotificationCenter
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable notification center (reduces background).

items.name: Registry tweak: NOC_GLOBAL_SETTING_TOASTS_ENABLED
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable toast notifications.

items.name: Registry tweak: EnableFeeds
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable Windows Feeds.

items.name: Registry tweak: ShellFeedsTaskbarViewMode
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable widgets/feeds on taskbar.

items.name: Registry tweak: DisableSearchBoxSuggestions
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable search box suggestions.

items.name: Registry tweak: LaunchTo
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Open File Explorer to 'This PC'.

items.name: Registry tweak: SFIO Priority
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Games SFIO priority.

items.name: Registry tweak: IconsOnly
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Show icons only (hide thumbnails).

items.name: Registry tweak: ShowInfoTip
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable infotips.

items.name: Registry tweak: ShowTypeOverlay
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable shortcut arrow overlay.

items.name: Registry tweak: DisableThumbnailCache
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Ensure thumbnail cache enabled (faster browsing).

items.name: Registry tweak: NoNewAppAlert
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable 'new app installed' notifications.

items.name: Registry tweak: AllowClipboardHistory
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable clipboard history.

items.name: Registry tweak: AllowCrossDeviceClipboard
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable cross-device clipboard.

items.name: Registry tweak: DisableAcrylicBackgroundOnLogon
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable acrylic background on logon.

items.name: Registry tweak: EnableSmartScreen
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable SmartScreen (policy).

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_ShowClassicMode
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Use classic Start behavior where supported.

items.name: Registry tweak: ShowCortanaButton
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Hide Cortana button (if present).

items.name: Registry tweak: ShowTaskViewButton
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Hide Task View button.

items.name: Registry tweak: ShowSecondsInSystemClock
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Show seconds in system clock.

items.name: Registry tweak: SearchboxTaskbarMode
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Hide Search box on taskbar.

items.name: Registry tweak: IsDeviceSearchHistoryEnabled
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable device search history.

items.name: Registry tweak: IsCloudSearchEnabled
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable cloud search.

items.name: Registry tweak: UseOLEDTaskbarTransparency
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable taskbar transparency.

items.name: Registry tweak: EnableSnapBar
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable snap bar (Win11).

items.name: Registry tweak: TdrDdiDelay
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Set GPU TDR DDI delay to 10.

items.name: Registry tweak: DisableSearchBoxSuggestions
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable search box suggestions (user).

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_NotifyNewApps
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable 'new apps installed' notifications (user).

items.name: Registry tweak: TaskbarAl
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable taskbar alignment center (0=left) (Win11).

items.name: Registry tweak: ShowCopilotButton
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Hide Copilot button (if present).

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_Layout
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Reduce Start layout density (if supported).

items.name: Registry tweak: SnapAssist
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable Snap Assist.

items.name: Registry tweak: DisableTaskbarThumbnails
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Ensure taskbar thumbnails enabled.

items.name: Registry tweak: ExtendedUIHoverTime
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Reduce extended UI hover time.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_SearchFiles
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Prioritize local file search.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_SearchPrograms
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Prioritize programs in search.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_SearchInternet
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable internet search results.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_ShowAppsView
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Prefer all apps view (if supported).

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_ShowRecentlyAddedApps
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Hide recently added apps.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_ShowMostUsedApps
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Hide most used apps.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_JumpListItems
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Set jump list items to 10.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_TrackDocs
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable tracking docs (duplicate-safe).

items.name: Registry tweak: DisableDynamicScrollbars
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disable dynamic scrollbars.

items.name: Registry tweak: KeyboardDelay
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Keyboard repeat delay to fastest.

items.name: Registry tweak: KeyboardSpeed
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Keyboard repeat rate to max.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_ShowRun
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Show Run in Start context.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_ShowControlPanel
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Show Control Panel in Start.

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_ShowMyGames
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Hide My Games (if present).

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_ShowMyMusic
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Hide My Music (if present).

items.name: Registry tweak: Start_ShowMyPics
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Hide My Pictures (if present).
